title: EOD Update
text:
July 25-28
Built a Questionnaire Analytics dashboard
• Created Total Count Tiles for Active, Draft, Retired, Deleted Questionnaires using Emr_Questionnaire.
• Built "Top 10 Questionnaires" Table using Emr_Questionnaire + Emr_QuestionnaireResponse, grouped by ID & Title, counted responses.
• Added Donut Chart for "Number of Questionnaires per Tag" using Emr_QuestionnaireTag + Emr_Questionnaire.
• Added "Responses by Week" and "Responses by Day" trend charts using Emr_QuestionnaireResponse grouped by response date
